name: Caniheim (Alpha: Portuguese Version)
description:
Caniheim is top down isometric RPG where you, a mercenary dog, need to investigate an invasion in a village by creatures from other dimension. English translation coming soon.

First Alpha realise in portuguese. More to implementations to come. 

Character Generation : Build your dog as any of 8 main classic RPG classes.

Build your party: Make others NPCs join you in your quest

Inventory, Craft and Quest System:

Dialogue system:  I will improve it as soon as possible

Karma System: Be a good dog or a bad dog influencing the story!

Magic: Cast spells depending on your or you companion class

Better UI, models, maps, enemies and a lot more.

All i need is time and of course resources to make a great RPG game with a huge lore..

Please donate. Any help will be huge as i'm solo developer, design and artist at this moment. For donation contact oliveira.chinape@gmail.com

Kickstarter coming soon
